data.title: Kiefer Sutherland Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Kiefer Sutherland on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Kiefer Sutherland including Monsters vs. Aliens, Young Guns, and more.
data.text:
Australian Luxury GT Road Trip - M6 Gran Coupe vs. Continental GT vs. GT-R

The trio embark on a road trip across Australia's Northern Territory, setting out on an adventure that takes in crocodile infested rivers, a race around a vast open cast mine, and an encounter with the world's longest truck.

Jaaaaaaaags

Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May try to prove that old Jaguars are not only stylish and roguish, but also strong and reliable with a road trip across Colorado featuring a dirt track, a dangerous runway and a brave attempt to go skiing in cars. Plus Luke Evans and Kiefer Sutherland go head-to-head in Celebrity Face Off.

Andrew Garfield/Coldplay

Sketches include Donald Sterling Press Conference Cold Open, Andrew Garfield Monologue, Stanx, Celebrity Family Feud, Oliver, The Beygency, Weekend Update (featuring Olya, Leslie Jones, and Jebidiah), Spiderman Kiss, Wedding, and Bird Bible. Check out these selected sketches and segments from each of this season's episodes, so you can make every night a Saturday Night.
